00012 WError::WError()
00013 {
00014   this_ = this;
00015 
00016   typedef std::pair<int, std::string> Message;
00017 
00018   const Message messages[] = {
00019     Message(ERR_OK, "No Error"),
00020     Message(ERR_UNKNOWN, "Unknown Error"),
00021     Message(ERR_FAIL, "Operation failed"),
00022     Message(ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED, "Not initialized"),
00023     Message(ERR_NOT_APPLICABLE, "Not applicable"),
00024     Message(ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND, "Parameter not found"),
00025     Message(ERR_INDEX, "Index out-of-range"),
00026     Message(ERR_INCORRECT_ELEMENT_SET, "Incorrect element set"),
00027     Message(ERR_INCORRECT_LENS_MODE, "Incorrect lens mode"),
00028     Message(ERR_INCORRECT_PASS_ENERGY, "Incorrect pass energy"),
00029     Message(ERR_INCORRECT_ANALYZER_REGION, "Error in analyzer region"),
00030     Message(ERR_INCORRECT_DETECTOR_REGION, "Error in detector region"),
00031     Message(ERR_READONLY, "Variable is read-only"),
00032     Message(ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT, "No instrument loaded"),
00033     Message(ERR_ACQUIRING, "Acquisition in progress"),
00034     Message(ERR_TIMEOUT, "Operation time-out"),
00035     Message(ERR_INITIALIZE_FAIL, "Error in call to function GDS_Initialize()"),
00036     Message(ERR_LOAD_LIBRARY, "Could not load the instrument library"),
00037     Message(ERR_OPEN_INSTRUMENT, "Could not open the instrument configuration file"),
00038     Message(ERR_QT_RUNNING, "QT is running. Disable direct_viewer in DetectorGraph.ini"),
00039     Message(ERR_INVALID_DIR, "Invalid SES directory. Call setLibWorkingDir with a valid directory path"),
00040     Message(ERR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED, "Not implemented")
00041   };
00042   for (int i = 0; i < sizeof(messages) / sizeof(Message); i++)
00043     messages_.insert(messages[i]);
00044 }

00061 std::string WError::message(int errorCode)
00062 {
00063   ErrorMessageMap::iterator it = messages_.find(errorCode);
00064   if (it != messages_.end())
00065     return it->second;
00066 
00067   return "Unknown error";
00068 }

00077 WError *WError::instance()
00078 {
00079   if (this_ == 0)
00080   {
00081     this_ = new WError();
00082   }
00083 
00084   refCount_++;
00085   return this_;
00086 }

00094 void WError::release()
00095 {
00096   refCount_--;
00097   if (refCount_ == 0)
00098   {
00099     delete this_;
00100     this_ = 0;
00101   }
00102   if (refCount_ < 0)
00103     refCount_ = 0;
00104 }
